sorry_only_youtube: Sorry, I can support only youtube for now.
no_idea_what_to_do: I have no idea what to do with that.
hello_message:
Welcome! Write me some text. 
For more info use /help
change_voice_help: /change -> help you to change voice change voice
change_volume_help:
/volume or /vl -> change volume 
    default value: 100
    range: 1<->100
user_do_not_have_clients: You don't have clients, select client use /clients
sorry_to_big: Ow... to much text, try send less than 1500 characters please
file_too_big: Oww... File too big... Telegram allow to handle bot a file 25Mb or less
add_new_pig_instruction: To add new pig client write this command: /add_client <client-name> <client-secret-key> <type: public|private> e.g. /add_client my-pig xyz-qwe-asd-fgh-cvbvds private
add_new_pig_error: Something is missing, use this format: /add_client <client-name> <client-secret-key> <type: public|private> e.g. /add_client my-pig xyz-qwe-asd-fgh-cvbvds private
find_private_pig_instruction: To find private pig client write this command: /find_client <client-secret-key> e.g. /find_client xyz-qwe-asd-fgh-cvbvds
find_private_pig_error: Something is missing, use this format: /find_client <client-secret-key> e.g. /find_client xyz-qwe-asd-fgh-cvbvds
